TopicTitle: Been out of the loop for a while

Articles.Content:
I have been playing DayZ a lot since the standalone came out. I have left my space program on hold and would like to know what new mods have been put out as well as which ones are updated and work with .23. What are your suggestions right now with whats out there?

Edit: Been gone so long I put this in general but I think it might be better off in General Add-on Affairs. Movie it maybe? Please and thank you.

Edited January 26, 2014 by Secret Squirrel
This is probably a good place to start
Thank you that is exactly what I was looking for and couldn't find it.
